HOME_CONTENT.title: Transforming Traditional Farming with
HOME_CONTENT.description: Monitor cow health, automate feeding, and ensure farm safety — all from your phone!

CONTACT.title: Let's Talk
CONTACT.description: Feature request? Suggestion? or maybe you'd like to be our critic! Here's a form just for that.

HERO_CONTENT.title: Transforming Traditional Farming with Smart IoT Technology
HERO_CONTENT.subtitle: Monitor cow health, automate feeding, and ensure farm safety — all from your phone!

ABOUT_CONTENT.title: About the Project
ABOUT_CONTENT.description: This project focuses on building a smart cow farming system using IoT technologies like GPS-enabled collars, environmental sensors, automated feeding systems, and a mobile app for real-time monitoring.

steps.title: Data Collection
steps.description: Sensors collect temperature, humidity, and air quality. GPS-enabled collars track cow movement.

steps.title: Data Transmission
steps.description: Devices like ESP32 send data through WiFi, LoRa, or GSM to a cloud platform.

steps.title: Cloud Integration
steps.description: Data is stored and processed on AWS/Google Cloud, allowing real-time monitoring and analytics.

steps.title: User Interface
steps.description: A mobile app (Blynk) or website dashboard displays live farm conditions and sends alerts.

steps.title: Automation
steps.description: Feeding schedules and environment controls can be automated using smart actuators.
